game_engine.field.field module¶

class game_engine.field.field.Field(rules: dict)¶

Bases: object

This is a Field object.

It contains logic for interaction with game objects

Parameters

rules (dict) – rules of game

Variables

  • gameplay_rules – gameplay rules

  • game_map – game map

  • exit_cells – list of exit cell objects

  • treasures – treasures dropped on filed

  • players – players

action_handler(action: game_engine.global_env.enums.Actions, direction: Optional[game_engine.global_env.enums.Directions] = None) → game_engine.field.response.RespHandler¶

handle player action

break_wall(cell: game_engine.field.cell.Cell, direction: game_engine.global_env.enums.Directions)¶

Break wall by direction if wall is breakable

Returns

wall that was broken

get_active_player() → game_engine.entities.player.Player¶

returns active Player object

get_player_allowed_abilities(player: game_engine.entities.player.Player) → dict[game_engine.global_env.enums.Actions, bool] | None¶

returns dict of player abilities

get_treasures_on_exit() → list[game_engine.entities.treasure.Treasure]¶

returns list of treasures on exit cell

sort_players()¶

sort players by turn order and .is_bot attribute

spawn_bots(bots_amount: int) → list[game_engine.entities.player.Player]¶

spawn bots by bots_amount.

Each bot has random spawn point

spawn_player(spawn_point: dict, name: str, turn: int) → bool¶

Spawns player object with given spawn point, name, and turn order

Returns

True if player can be spawned, else False

Return type

bool

game_engine.field.response module¶

class game_engine.field.response.RespHandler¶

Bases: object

Base Response handler object

Variables

  • treasures – list of treasures on turn-end cell

  • cell_at_end_of_turn – players location cell on turn-end

  • player_name – name of active player

  • action – players action

  • direction – players direction

get_info() → str¶

returns turn info converted to str
